item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the June meeting of the Greater Boston NLP group.

This monthâ€™s topic: Adam's Greatest Hits

As many of you know, I'll be leaving the Boston area next month. Therefore, I wanted to pick a few of my favorite NLP techniques to leave you with before I go.

My thoughts right now are that we will start with the technique "Spinning Feelings" (unless many of you already know it, in which case we may do the anchoring technique "Change Personal History"). I'd like to finish with metaphorical problem-solving, where we'll literally "draw" our way out of our problems.

Time permitting, I may also demonstrate one or more advanced patterns. These may include the Decision Destroyer technique, the NLP allergy cure, the Walt Disney creativity strategy, and/or 6-step Reframing.

When you RSVP, let me know if you're particularly interested in particular techniques, either the ones I've mentioned or something else.

After the main part of the evening (7:15-9:15), you are all welcome to stay for some farewell socializing.

Everyone is welcome to this meetup, from beginners to experts. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions about the group in general or this meeting in particular.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

Adam

Adam Marx
NLP Master Practitioner
New Light NLP
317 N Main St, Natick MA 01760
(617) 329-1657
adam@NewLightNLP.com
www.NewLightNLP.com
----------------------------------
Helping you to become the you that you want to be:
Coaching, Counseling, and Training
item.how_to_find_us: Go straight back to the large studio (after 7pm)

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP June Meetup - Adam's Greatest Hits
